item.title: Loud Electrical Noise Ongoing for 48 HOURS, 8th June
item.description:
This report concerns a loud noise which sounds unsafe and is affecting sleep. There is no category for this type of issue hence why i am reporting it under this category. There is a very loud, and dangerous sounding "electrical" noise coming from somewhere in the close vicinity of CAVOUR HOUSE SE17. This noise has been ongoing for around 48 hours and is so loud as to affect sleep. Whatever is making the noise sounds dangerous. Please send someone to inverstigate further.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Ambergate Street, Elephant and Castle, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Rubbish bag ripped open right in the middle of the street, 8th June
